function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through indoor plants and green spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and infection, especially in confined spaces and healthcare environments","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for plant maintenance and cleanliness, limit access to plants in healthcare environments, and provide education on safe handling of indoor plants","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV sterilization, and remote monitoring systems for plant health","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and individuals in confined spaces","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, environmental health departments, and facility management"},{"Description":"Poor mental and emotional health due to lack of access to natural light and green views","Impact":"Increased risk of depression, agitation, poor mood, and sleep disturbances","Mitigation":"Maximize natural light exposure, incorporate green views in indoor environments, and provide alternative therapies for individuals with limited access to nature","Technologies":"Smart lighting systems, window design optimization, and virtual reality nature simulations","People":"Elderly in nursing homes, individuals in confinement, and healthcare patients","Owner":"Facility management, architects, and healthcare providers"}]}
